subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Hiring and Promotion
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. coaching shuffle became more definitive Saturday when the St. Louis Rams hired Steve Spagnuolo, former defensive coordinator for the Giants, as their head coach.
snippet: The N.F.L. coaching shuffle became more definitive Saturday when the St. Louis Rams hired Steve Spagnuolo, former defensive coordinator for the Giants, as their head coach.
